it.polimi.se2018.controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.utils.Observable
      • it.polimi.se2018.controller.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends Observable
    Class that represent the Controller according the MVC paradigm. It contains the logic "in-the-large" while the logic "in-the-small" is contained in Model classes. Controller receives messages from connected View(s) validating and, in case, redirecting them to the connected Game.
    Author:
    Lorenzo Minto, Jacopo Pio Gargano, Federico Haag
    See Also:
    Game, ControllerState, ControllerStateManager, ToolCard, ToolCardManager, DiceBag, ObjectiveCardManager, PlacementRule, WindowPatternManager

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected ControllerState controllerState
      The current state of the Controller
      protected DiceBag diceBag
      Contains an istance of a DiceBag in order to create the needed dices for the game
      protected Game game
      The controlled Game
      protected PlacementRule placementRule
      The current Placement Rule that is used in the current Turn in order to decide if a placement move is allowed or not
      protected ControllerStateManager stateManager
      Contains an instance of a ControllerStateManager that is the one that creates the needed ControllerState during a change of state

      • setActiveToolCard

        protected boolean setActiveToolCard(ToolCard toolCard)
        Sets the specified ToolCard as active. This means that it's being used during the current Turn
        Parameters:
        toolCard - the ToolCard that is being used
        Returns:
        true if the operation was successful

        Parameters:

      • advanceGame

        protected void advanceGame()
        Let the game advance in the turns sequence. If in the current Round have been played all the possible Turns it is created a new Round. If the current Round is the last one, the game is ended calling manageRankings().

      • getConfigProperty

        public int getConfigProperty(java.lang.String p)
        Returns Dictionary of configuration's parameters
        Parameters:
        p - the configuration property to retrieve
        Returns:
        Dictionary of configuration's parameters
